page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: I started in the GCG Brass Band and I was introduced to an instrument that is like a tuba. Our teacher's name is Mr, Jones. I am in the juniors. The big band has got 28 people all together. The band first started in 1893, the band is 92 years old. The name of the conductor is Mr, Morris. The Bands hall is at the bottom of church lane in Cwmgors. I play a cornet now instead of the instrument I had started with. I go to Band every Tuesday and Friday on my bike but if it is raining my mother will take me in the car. The band starts at half past six and ends at half past seven. The Band has got different instruments. Here are names of some instruments;trumpet, trombone, tuba, cymbals, brass drum and a side drum.
